nodes.text: A stalemate or even  peaceful regime change  would undermine the U.S. ability to shape political outcomes in Iraq the first domino in the Bush vision.
the U.S. has to win an overwhelming victory one that ends completely the current Baghdad regime
A stalemate or a peaceful regime change is opposite to an overwhelming victory
A stalemate or a peaceful regime change should not be brough about
Only then will Washington have the free hand it wants to remake Iraq as well as the leverage with other governments in the region.
If the victory is not overwhelming USA won`t have the free hand in Iraq
